## Interactive Histogram

```{r}
sliderInput("bins", "Number of bins:", min = 5, max = 50, value = 20
```

```{r}
renderPlot({
  hist(faithful$waiting,
       breaks = input$bins,
       col = "skyblue",
       border = "white",
       main = "Histogram of Waiting Times",
       xlab = "Minutes")
})
```

## Personalized Greeting

```{r}
textInput("name", "What's your name?", "R user")
```

```{r}
renderText({
  paste("Hello,", input$name, "! Welcome to ShinyLive.")
})
```
